snippet: Former NFL and Alabama fullback Kevin Turner died Thursday at the age of 46 after battling Lou Gehrig's disease....
lead_paragraph: Former NFL and Alabama fullback Kevin Turner died Thursday at the age of 46 after battling Lou Gehrig's disease.

headline.main: Former NFL, Tide Player Kevin Turner Dies After Battling ALS
headline.print_headline: Former NFL, Tide Player Kevin Turner Dies After Battling ALS
